detail_desc: Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a hood lined with faux fur and a zip with a wind flap and buttons down the front. Drawstring below the bust and at the hem, flap front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a grandad collar and buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, an open back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, fluffy velour with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 2-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut dress in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline and short, open sleeves with ties at the ends. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a flounce-trimmed seam at the top and short, wide, broderie anglaise sleeves.

Multiway push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Detachable shoulder straps and a detachable, adjustable strap at the back. The bra can be worn as a halterneck bra, with the straps crossed over at the back or with the straps crossed at the back and wound round the body.

prod_name: DeLuca pull on TVP RW TVP
detail_desc: Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Headband in a soft knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 15 cm.
Dress in glossy jersey with long sleeves and a motif on the front with glittery details. Seam at the waist and a satin-lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.
Dress in soft jersey with a cut-out section at the waist and long, wide sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a tie, and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton seersucker with an open, wrapover back with a concealed fastening at the top and ties at the hem. Long sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, side pockets, an inner pocket, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, side stripes and wide, ribbed hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a deep neckline at the front, long sleeves and a high slit at the hem.

Long dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top and a yoke with a crocheted lace trim front and back. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cocoon-shaped blouse in a crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the back and long balloon sleeves.
Long dress with a lace bodice partly lined in satin with side support and a concealed zip in one side. Short cap sleeves, a grosgrain seam at the waist and a lined, pleated skirt in chiffon.
Hooded sports top in airy, fast-drying jersey with raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a drawstring at the hem.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a raw-edge, frayed hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Snap-on bracelets in soft faux fur with a small, padded rabbit on top.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Seam at the waist with pleats and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with a high waist with gathered seams, a lined front and back section and lined gusset.

Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable jersey hood, quilted sections at the top and a zip down the front. Diagonal, zipped front pockets and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Cap in twill made from a cotton blend with a decorative bow at one side and covered elastication at the back. Lining and sweatband in a cotton weave.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. The polyester content of the scarf is recycled.
Soft cotton cardigan in a fine, textured knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length approx. 6 cm.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high waist, pleats at the top and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, pockets in the side seams and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, tapered legs.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Small shoulder bag in canvas with suede details, a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and a flap with a magnetic fastener. Card compartment inside with space for three cards. Lined. Size 7.5x17x21 cm.
Slides with a knot detail at the front, imitation leather linings and rubber soles.
Lace suspender belt to hold nylon stockings up with elastic straps at the top and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit cotton top with sequins sewn on the front and a skirt in a double layer of patterned tulle. Lined skirt.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved top in jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Body in jersey with a wrapover top, deep V-neck and draping. Gathered seam at the shoulders and waist, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Short dress in soft twill made from a modal and cotton blend containing some linen. Round, gathered neckline with an opening and narrow ties at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck front and back and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.

Shirt in airy, pattern-weave cotton with a collar, buttons down the front and double-layered yoke and pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Tape-trimmed V-neck front and back.
Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and narrow tie. Deep V-neck, seam at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a print motif. Frill trim around the armholes.
Sports top in marled, fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible seams.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Satin-covered plastic Alice band with glittery tulle and an appliqué in the shape of a fluffy spider on top.

Short dress in a patterned cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and elasticated, elbow-length puff sleeves. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Lined with a V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Leggings with an elasticated waist and smooth trim with overlocked seams at the hems. 60 denier.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with coated sleeves, a hood, draped front with a diagonal zip and side pockets.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft, printed, stretch cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
